hero.title: OldFox-Tour:Ingendo Nyobokamana Ziteguwe Neza
hero.internationalTourDesc: OldFox ikuyobora ahantu h'umwuka ku isi yose
hero.religionTourDesc: Sura ahantu hera ufashijwe n'ubumenyi bw'inzobere za OldFox
hero.localTourDesc: Menya ahantu hatangaje mu by'umwuka n'ubukera rugendo wasura hamwe na Oldfox

footer.description: Sura isi na Exodus: Umufatanya bikorwa

about.quote1: Ikigo OLD Fox gitegura ingendo nyobokamana, kigafasha abantu ku giti cyabo n’amatsinda gusura ahantu hatagatifu ku isi hose. Ingendo zacu zigamije gufasha abantu gukura mu mwuka,Gusenga, kwiyumvamo no gusobanukirwa umuco. Tugufasha gusura insengero za kera cyangwa imijyi mitagatifu, buri rugendo ruhuza  abagenzi n’ukwemera kwabo n’imico yabo. Twitondera gutegura buri rugendo kugira ngo ubuzima bw’abagenzi bugende neza kandi bubashimishe.
about.quote2: Ingendo zacu zitanga ubunararibonye buhindura ubuzima, zihuriza hamwe kunguka ubumenyi bw'iyobokamana no kwinjira mu muco. Abagenzi basura ahantu h’ingenzi h’idini, bakagira uruhare mu migenzo gakondo yaho, kandi bakagira umwanya wo guhura n'abemera bagenzi babo. Izi ngendo ziteza imbere isubiramo n’isesengura, zitanga ubusobanuro bwimbitse ku kwemera ndetse n’urwibutso rurambye ku hantu h’iyobokamana hubahwa cyane ku isi.

destinations.rwandaDescription: Menya umurage w'idini w'u Rwanda, uhuza umuco n'umwuka.
destinations.israelDescription: Menya  umurage ukungahaye wo mu mwuka wa Isiraheli n'ibiranga ahera.
destinations.turkeyDescription: Menya ahantu hera muri Turukiya, ihuriro ry'amadini ya kera.
destinations.egyptDescription: Menya ibitangaza byo mu mwuka bya Misiri hamwe n'insengero za kera.

service.title: Serivisi
service.subtitle: Serivisi Dutanga
service.description: Subiza amaso ku bimenyetso bitandukanye by’amadini no ku mibereho y’umwuka, bigaragaza umuco ukungahaye n’imigenzo gakondo. Suzuma insengero zera, za kiliziya za kera, n’amahema y’itorero arangwa n’amahoro, buri kimwe gifite inkuru z’imihango ya kera n’ukwizera gukomeye. Ujye mu minsi mikuru n’imigenzo y’umwuka ihuza abantu, ikwereke neza urugendo rw’ubumwe n’ukwemera abatuye isi bose bahuriyeho.

products.title: Ibicuruzwa
products.subtitle: Ibicuruzwa by'Amateka
products.discription: Sura biro yacu kugirango ugure ibicuruzwa by'idini bifite ireme mu buryo bwa hafi.

contact.question_message: NIBA ufite ikibazo icyo ari cyo cyose ntuzatinye kutwandikira.
contact.subject: Icyo usaba

forgotPassword.title: Wibagiwe Ijambo ry'Ibanga?
forgotPassword.statusSuccess: Ubutumwa bwo kubyutsa ijambo ry'ibanga bwoherejwe!

profile.title: Ikibaho cy'Umukoresha
profile.clickToUpload: Kanda kuri iyi foto kugira ngo ushyiremo ifoto nshya y'umwirondoro
profile.likedDestinationsDescription: Aha ni ahantu wakunze. Bizagaragara ku rupapuro rw'ahabanza.
profile.supportDescription: Niba ufite ibibazo cyangwa se hari icyo ushaka kubaza, ntutinye guhita utwandikira.
profile.describeProblem: Sobanura ikibazo cyawe cyangwa ikibazo ufite
profile.newDestinationTutor: Gishya! Kanda hano kugira ngo umenye byinshi kuri aha hantu.

rwanda.name: U Rwanda
rwanda.description: Menya ubwiza n'umuco w'Igihugu cy'Imisozi Igihumbi.

turkey.name: Turukiya
turkey.description: Injira mu muco ukomeye w'umurwa mukuru wa Turukiya.

israel.name: Isiraheli
israel.description: Rambagira amateka n'imisozi itandukanye y'Igihugu Cyera.

tours.internationalTour: OldFox igufasha gusura ahantu h'amateka y'iyobokamana ku isi
tours.religionTour: Sura ahantu hatagatifu ukoresheje ubunararibonye bwa OldFox
tours.localTour: Menya ahantu hihishe h'iyobokamana hafi yawe ukoresheje OldFox

KibehoHolyLand.name: Ahera ha Kibeho
KibehoHolyLand.description: Hazwi kubera Amabonekerwa ya Bikira Mariya i Kibeho, aha ni hamwe gusa hemewe na Vatikani muri Afurika.
KibehoHolyLand.significance: Ahantu hakomeye h’ubusabaniramana muri Kiliziya Gatolika, aho Umubyeyi Bikira Mariya yabonekeye abakobwa batatu mu myaka ya 1980.

ReginaPacisCathedral.name: Katedrali Regina Pacis
ReginaPacisCathedral.description: Katedrali y'ingenzi y'Abakatolika i Kigali, yerekana ubwubatsi bw'igikristo bwa none bwa Afurika.
ReginaPacisCathedral.significance: Ikibuga cy'amasengesho y'Abakatolika mu murwa mukuru w'u Rwanda

NyakibandaSeminary.name: Seminari ya Nyakibanda
NyakibandaSeminary.description: Imwe mu maseminari akuru kandi ashaje mu Rwanda, yigisha abapadiri kuva mu 1936.
NyakibandaSeminary.significance: Ikigo cy'amateka cyo kwigisha no gutoza idini

WesternWall.name: Inkike y'Iburengerazuba
WesternWall.description: Ahantu hera cyane mu idini y'Abayahudi, igice cy'inkike ya kera ya Tempeli.
WesternWall.significance: Inkike isigaye ya Tempeli ya Kabiri ya Yerusalemu

ChurchOfTheHolySepulchre.name: Kiliziya y'Imva Ntagatifu
ChurchOfTheHolySepulchre.description: Ahantu gakondo h'aho Yesu yabambwe, ashyingurwa, kandi azuka.
ChurchOfTheHolySepulchre.significance: Ahantu h'ingenzi h'urugendo rw'amadini menshi y'Abakristo

AlAqsaMosque.name: Umusigiti wa Al-Aqsa
AlAqsaMosque.description: Ahantu ha gatatu hera cyane mu Buyisilamu, hari ku Musozi wa Tempeli.

BahaiGardens.name: Ubusitani bwa Bahá'í
BahaiGardens.description: Ubusitani bw'intambike bukikije Imva ya Báb i Haifa.
BahaiGardens.significance: Ikibuga Nyobokamana cya Bahá'í ku Isi

SeaOfGalilee.name: Inyanja ya Galilaya
SeaOfGalilee.description: Inyanja y'amazi meza ifitanye isano n'ibikorwa byinshi mu buzima bwa Yesu.
SeaOfGalilee.significance: Ahantu h'ingenzi ku bahererezi b'Abakristo n'abakunzi ba kamere

GreatPyramidOfGiza.name: Piramide Nini ya Giza
GreatPyramidOfGiza.description: Imwe mu Bitangaza Birindwi bya Kera by'Isi, yubatswe nk'imva ya Farawo Khufu.
GreatPyramidOfGiza.significance: Ikimenyetso cy'ubwami bwa Egiputa ya kera n'igitangaza cy'ubwubatsi

LuxorTemple.name: Urusengero rwa Luxor
LuxorTemple.description: Urwego runini rw'urusengero rwa Egiputa ya kera ruri ku nkombe y'iburasirazuba bw'umugezi Nili.
LuxorTemple.significance: Ahantu h'ingenzi h'idini rya Egiputa ya kera n'amateka

SaintCatherinesMonastery.name: Monasteri ya Mutagatifu Katerina
SaintCatherinesMonastery.description: Imwe mu monasteri z'Abakristo zikora zikiri nshya cyane ku isi.
SaintCatherinesMonastery.significance: Ahantu h'ingenzi ku Bakristo b'Abortodogisi kandi hakaba n'inyandiko z'agaciro

HagiaSophia.name: Hagia Sophia
HagiaSophia.description: Yari katedrali y'Abakristo b'Abagiriki Ortodogisi, nyuma iba umusigiti w'Abaturuki, ubu ni inzu ndangamurage.
HagiaSophia.significance: Igitangaza cy'ubwubatsi n'ikimenyetso cy'amateka atandukanye ya Istanbul

Ephesus.name: Efeso
Ephesus.description: Umujyi wa kera w'Abagiriki ku nkombe ya Ionia, uzwi cyane ku rusengero rwa Artemis.
Ephesus.significance: Umwe mu mijyi ya kera yabungabunzwe neza cyane mu Mediterane

Cappadocia.name: Kapadokiya
Cappadocia.description: Akarere kazwi cyane ku 'nkingi z'abazimu', zakozwe n'imyuka ya volukano.
Cappadocia.significance: Ubutaka budasanzwe n'amateka y'Ubukristo bwa mbere

activities.1: Ingendo mu Mijyi yo Munsi y'Ubutaka
